alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 7:59AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Forest Lakes and Heber- Overgaard. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact any morning commuters. Additional snow forecast from 7 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
